gcc -rdynamic CMakeFiles/main.dir/src/freetype_fun.c.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/src/lcd_fun.c.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/src/main.c.o CMakeFiles/main.dir/src/png_fun.c.o -o bin/main  -Wl,-rpath,/home/liuao/third_lib/libpng/lib:/home/liuao/third_lib/freetype/lib -lpthread /home/liuao/third_lib/libpng/lib/libpng.so /home/liuao/third_lib/freetype/lib/libfreetype.so
